QuestData.Title: Proof of Strength: Gronnling Scale
QuestData.Description: This scale is proof of your strength at slaying ogron and your gladiator friend has born witness!$b$bTake the scale back to Limbflayer and claim your accolades!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the proof to Limbflayer at Beastwatch in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: A gladiator saw you tear this off the back of a gronnling, which I am sure did not part with it easily. It is more like a stone than a true scale though as these brutes are part stone it seems. Not an easy trophy to collect!
